column5: Dave's ad for Subway has been airing alot.   Especially during the playoffs.  The unusual thing is even though they are using the Dave Mercer in the ad, the fact that it is him is not an element of the ad.(He is not even introduced)  At any rate, Dave is looking a lot healthier.  Good on you Dave.  Cheers, Mark
I was waiting for the laugh but never heard it!
I seen the ad,Dave has lost a lot of wieght.
I don't think Dave needs to be introduced, doesn't everybody know him by now Tight Lines SBK
Ya, Dave is like that Bebier kid... At least on here.
thank you for confirming it's him, the jogging and looking much thinner threw me off
He does look thin, he didn't look that thin at the fishing show a month ago?  maybe they used a video version of photoshop?
